text: pUrvaq A &la#Banta dar.SapUrNamAqsA-vAqlaBa#mAna Eqtau hOmau# puqrastA$jjuhuyAth sAqkShAdEqva da#r.SapUrNamAqsAvA la#BatE brahmavAqdinO# vadantiq sa tvai da#r.SapUrNamAqsAvA la#BEtaq ya E#nayOranu-lOqma~jca# pratilOqma~jca# viqdyAditya#mAvAqsyA#yA UqrddhvaM tada#nulOqmaM pau$rNamAqsyai pra#tIqcInaqM tat pra#tilOqmaM ~Myat pau$rNamAqsIM pUrvA#mAqlaBE#ta pratilOqmamE#nAqvA la#BEtAq-muma#paqkShIya#mANaq-manvapa# - [  ]   3
